workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.04507072930133127 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.4942773618935738 --weight-decay 0.0005881768062986051 --lr 0.0004448611342640895 --lr-scheduler cosine --warmup-init-lr 1e-7 --warmup-updates 55608 --max-lr 0.0007018851659844588 --min-lr 1e-09 --t-mult 0.7363171976384838 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.11981885867628184 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY --tensorboard-logdir $PHILLY_SCRATCH_DIRECTORY
